Sentencas: Interest in steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons is growing due to the necessity of developing reliable alternatives for their use in fuel cells.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: In particular, solid oxide fuel cells, which can operate with mixtures of H-2 and CO2 are excellent candidates for being fed with liquid fuels coming from both fossil and renewable sources.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: Fossil-derived, synthetic diesel is an interesting option.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: In this work, an Al2O3-Zi-O-2-supported nickel-alumina spinel was tested in a lab-scale isothermal packed-bed reactor as a catalyst of steam reforming of propane, hexadecane and tetralin as surrogates of constitutive families of all commercially available diesel fuels.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: The results show that the reaction reaches equilibrium at reaction severities lower than those reported in the literature.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: When operated at steam excess of 250%, carbon formation is not higher than expected by theoretical thermodynamic equilibrium calculations, and no significant catalyst deactivation is observed over the test durations.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy of the fresh and used catalyst surfaces shows no significant quantities of carbon.
Titulo: Steam reforming of liquid hydrocarbons over a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst
